xwikidoc.content: rightsmanager.like=좋다 ### Missing: like.unlike.modal.title=Unlike confirmation ### Missing: like.unlike.modal.body=Are you sure you wish to remove your Like for page {0}? ### Missing: like.unlike.modal.closeButton=Close ### Missing: like.unlike.modal.unlikeButton=Unlike the page ### Missing: like.unlike.modal.viewLikersButton=Likes ### Missing: like.newlike.success=The page has been liked. ### Missing: like.newlike.error=Error when trying to like the page. ### Missing: like.unlike.success=The page has been unliked. ### Missing: like.unlike.error=Error when trying to unlike the page. ### Missing: like.userprofile.menu=Liked Pages ### Missing: like.button.title=Number of likes on this page: {0} ### Missing: like.button.title.like=Click to like the current page. Number of likes on this page: {0}. ### Missing: like.button.title.unlike=Click to unlike the current page. Number of likes on this page: {0}. ### Missing: like.likers.empty=No one likes this page yet. ### Missing: like.likers.number={0} person(s) like this page: ### Missing: like.likers.title=People liking {0} ### Missing: like.livetable.column.title=Title ### Missing: like.livetable.column.location=Location ### Missing: like.livetable.column.likes=Likes ### Missing: like.configuration.heading=Like Preferences ### Missing: XWiki.Like.LikeConfigurationClass_alwaysDisplayButton=Always display Like button ### Missing: XWiki.Like.LikeConfigurationClass_alwaysDisplayButton.hint=Display the button even if the user doesn't have the rights to interact with it. Use it if you wish to always display the Likes counter. ### Missing: XWiki.Like.LikeConfigurationClass_cacheCapacity=Cache capacity ### Missing: XWiki.Like.LikeConfigurationClass_cacheCapacity.hint=Number of Like information kept in cache. Note that you have to restart XWiki for this option change to be taken into account. ### Missing: XWiki.Like.LikeConfigurationClass_enabled=Enable Like feature ### Missing: XWiki.Like.LikeConfigurationClass_enabled.hint=If unchecked this will disable the Like feature and hide information related to Likes.
